comments: SRS - This would be more helpful if the easiest EECS classes were listed, since very few might have a workload of 1, or the student may have already taken those classes.
paraphrases: An easy EECS class is what I need .
An easy EECS class is what I 'm looking for .
Are there any easy EECS classes that I can take ?
Can you recommend an easy EECS class ?
I could use an easy EECS class .
I have to take an EECS class .
I require a less demanding EECS class .
I want an easy EECS class .
I would prefer an EECS class that is easy .
I 'd like to take an easy EECS course .
I 'm looking for an EECS course that 's simple and easy .
What EECS class has a reputation for being easy ?
What EECS class is an easy option ?
sentence: I need an easy EECS class .
sentence-with-vars: I need an easy department0 class .
sql: SELECT DISTINCT COURSEalias0.DEPARTMENT , COURSEalias0.NUMBER FROM COURSE AS COURSEalias0 , PROGRAM_COURSE AS PROGRAM_COURSEalias0 WHERE PROGRAM_COURSEalias0.COURSE_ID = COURSEalias0.COURSE_ID AND PROGRAM_COURSEalias0.WORKLOAD = 1 ;
sql-with-vars: SELECT DISTINCT COURSEalias0.DEPARTMENT , COURSEalias0.NUMBER FROM COURSE AS COURSEalias0 , PROGRAM_COURSE AS PROGRAM_COURSEalias0 WHERE PROGRAM_COURSEalias0.COURSE_ID = COURSEalias0.COURSE_ID AND PROGRAM_COURSEalias0.WORKLOAD = 1 ;
